Package Boards

Class BoardArray2D

java.lang.Object
Boards.AbstractBoard
Boards.BoardArray2D
public class BoardArray2D
extends AbstractBoard
BoardArray2D class represents the board configuration with 2D Array
Author:
Berk Pekgoz GTU 171044041

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardArray2D

      public BoardArray2D()
      No paramater constructor for BoardArray2D. Size of board is setted to (3,3) as default.

    • BoardArray2D

      Parameters:

      columnSize - Parameter for column size

  • Method Details

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int row, int column)
      Description copied from class: AbstractBoard
      Sets the board size to given values. The values are given as parameters and there are no restrictions on the board size and if the parameters are invalid board size, they are automaticlly setted to 3. The board is reset after this operation.
      Overrides:
      setSize in class AbstractBoard
      Parameters:
      row - Input row size to change rows
      column - Input column size to change columns

    • cell

      public int cell​(int row, int column)
      Description copied from class: AbstractBoard
      Takes two indexes and returns the corresponding cell content. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.
      Specified by:
      cell in class AbstractBoard
      Parameters:
      row - Input row number for cell
      column - Input column number for cell
      Returns:
      Value of cell

    • setCell

      protected void setCell​(int row, int column, int data)
      Description copied from class: AbstractBoard
      Takes two indexes and value to change the corresponding cell content. Terminates program if the indexes are not valid.
      Specified by:
      setCell in class AbstractBoard
      Parameters:
      row - Input row number for cell
      column - Input column number for cell
      data - New value of cell
